home_1: Welcome to Health Care Point AB
home_2: We are the health consultant that combines medical expertise, aesthetic results, and a holistic focus. Our team in Stockholm supports you throughout the journey – from the first consultation to the completed treatment with our partners.
home_14: Explore our comprehensive range of services. From medical treatments to beauty care, we strive to deliver outstanding service and results that exceed your expectations.
home_16: Individually customized advice to help you choose the right treatments, products, and plans to boost confidence and well-being.
home_18: Medical procedures performed by experienced specialist doctors using the latest technology to address various skin conditions, aging, and medical needs.
home_20: Relaxing treatments, rituals, and personal attention that restore balance, well-being, and peace of mind.
home_22: Access to advanced surgical techniques with personalized planning, professional care, and safe aftercare.
home_24: Complete coordination of health tourism – from consultation and logistics to support throughout the treatment journey with our partners in Turkey.
home_26: A comprehensive network with over a hundred healthcare facilities in Turkey and Europe providing access to the right expertise and resources for each patient.
home_27: Why choose Health Care Point AB?
home_28: Choose Health Care Point AB for safe and personalized care. We offer innovative medical treatments, advanced surgery, and relaxing spa experiences. Our dedicated team guides you towards health, beauty, and well-being with a focus on quality, safety, and care.
home_30: We match each patient with certified hospitals and clinics for safe treatment results.
home_32: Over 100 healthcare facilities in Turkey and Europe give us the flexibility to find the right treatment.
home_34: We handle planning, logistics, and follow-up so your treatment journey is simple.
home_36: Our team of 10 consultants guides you through every step and answers all your questions.
home_38: We balance health, beauty, and safety to exceed your expectations.
about_2: We are the health consultant that since 2023 guides patients in the Nordics and Europe to certified hospitals and clinics through a comprehensive network in health tourism.
about_4: Health Care Point AB was founded in 2023 with the goal of helping patients find the right treatment via leading healthcare institutions in Turkey. The company is headquartered in Stockholm and consists of a dedicated team of ten employees working exclusively with health tourism and office services for our partners.
about_5: Through a strong infrastructure and a growing international network, we can today help patients from over thirty countries travel to Turkey for medical treatments. Our ambition is to become the leading health consultant in the Nordics and Europe.
about_7: We connect patients with expert doctors, hospitals, and clinics that have the specialist competence and equipment needed for each unique treatment journey. Our focus is to create safe and transparent choices of healthcare providers.
about_8: The team has worked as consultants in various EU projects since 2005 and brings experience in project management, coordination, and event planning. Going forward, we plan health fairs and industry events in Sweden and Europe to strengthen cooperation between patients and healthcare providers.
about_10: These core values guide everything we do and shape how we interact with our patients and colleagues.
about_12: We are by the patient's side throughout the treatment journey and ensure that every decision is made based on their goals and needs.
about_14: Our network includes more than 100 hospitals and specialist clinics with proven expertise and modern healthcare methods.
about_16: We work openly with agreements, treatment plans, and follow-up so that patients and partners can feel full confidence.
about_18: Our Stockholm-based team builds long-term relationships with both patients and healthcare providers.
about_20: Each treatment journey is planned in detail with logistics, consultations, and follow-up that match the patient's timeframe and expectations.
about_22: We follow developments in health tourism and arrange upcoming health fairs and events in Sweden and Europe.
about_24: A dedicated Stockholm-based team that coordinates every step of your treatment journey and keeps in touch with our partners.
about_27: Personal advice and matching of healthcare providers
about_30: Continuous dialogue with specialist doctors and clinics
about_33: Coordination of travel plans, agreements, and follow-up
about_36: Health fairs, workshops, and partner relations in Europe
about_38: A strong partner network, long experience in international projects, and upcoming events ensure that patients receive the right care at the right time.
about_40: Over 100 affiliated hospitals and clinics in Turkey and Europe with documented expertise.
about_42: Solid experience in international collaborations, funding, and project management in health.
about_44: Planned activities in Sweden and Europe that bring together patients, experts, and healthcare providers.
about_46: Recognized certifications and awards for excellence in health tourism and patient care.
